answers.answer: Try to rest I feel like this quite often and sleeping does not take it all away but it is a nice relief! If you feel like there is a real problem call her and see what she says
Definitely call your doctor. Those are some early signs of preeclampsia and that can be very dangerous. It could also be nothing but I would for sure call your doctor and ask!!

question: I'm 26 weeks today and I'm having headaches , back pains,, feeling light headed (dizzy) , feeling weak!!! Just miserable, a lil shortness of breath.Should I call my doc , go to the ER or just sleep it off!!!????
